error.comment: Text color to indicate an error

warning.comment: Text color to indicate a warning or caution

inverse.comment: Text color to use on inverted backgrounds

dark.comment: Dark text color that won't change in dark mode

light.comment: Light text color that won't change in dark mode

shopping.comment: Text color to use for shopping surfaces

link.comment: Text color to use for links in documentation sites

error.comment: Icon color to indicate an error

warning.comment: Icon color to indicate a warning or caution

info.comment: Icon color to use for information

recommendation.comment: Icon color to use for recommendations

inverse.comment: Icon color to use on inverted backgrounds

shopping.comment: Icon color to use for shopping surfaces

primary.comment: Icon color to use solely for representing the Pinterest brand

light.comment: Icon color that will always remain light

dark.comment: Icon color that will always remain dark

default.comment: Background color that will match the current color scheme

base.comment: Background color to indicate neutral information

weak.comment: Weak background color to indicate neutral information, can be used behind text

strong.comment: Strong background color to indicate neutral information, can be used for hover

weak.comment: Weak background color to indicate errors, can be used behind text
Weak background color to indicate warnings, can be used behind text
Weak background color to indicate success, can be used behind text
Weak background color to indicate recommendations, can be used behind text

shopping.comment: Background color to indicate shopping-related features

strong.comment: Strong version of the primary background color, used for hover

weak.comment: Weak version of the primary background color, used for hover

strong.comment: Strong version of secondary background color, used for hover

weak.comment: Weak version of secondary background color, used for hover

strong.comment: Strong version of tertiary background color, used for hover

weak.comment: Weak version of tertiary background color, used for hover

base.comment: Background color to indicate selected state, like a selected IconButton

weak.comment: Weak version of the selected background color, used for hover

strong.comment: Strong version of the selected background color, used for hover

base.comment: Background color for use on inverted backgrounds

strong.comment: Strong version of inverse background color, used for hover

brand.comment: Background color to signify the Pinterest brand

education.comment: Background color to indicate educational moments or messages

dark.comment: Background color to supply a dark wash over an item

light.comment: Background color to supply a light wash over an item

dark.comment: Background color that will always be dark, no matter the color scheme

light.comment: Background color that will always be light, no matter the color scheme

accent.comment: Background color used to accent containers when shadows are not an option

floating.comment: Background color used for floating elements in dark mode (like Modal or OverlayPanel)

raised.comment: Background color used for raised elements in dark mode, like sticky headers or navigation footers

container.comment: Used to delineate a larger container, like Card or TextArea

default.comment: Used to indicate specific UI element boundaries, like Checkbox or RadioButton

error.comment: Used to indicate an error on a contained element, like TextField or TextArea
